column5: Hey everyone  Just picked up a partner for the series this year so it looks like Ill be making me big break into tounrament bass fishing !  We will be fishing the tri-bay bass tournaments. Should be a good time  Any one else going to be fishing the tournaments ?
is there a site with the dates?
Yes please, the last thing I want to do is drive 2 or 3 hours to a lake and see a bunch of 200hp bass boats ripping around.
come on theres nothing like the smell of 2 stroke oil in the morning lol
Yes I know, "Smells like victory"   .  Here are some dates I found on WFN:  http://www.wfn.tv/events/calendar/
Yep... www.tbba.ca  The series is just a small series ... its only 3 tounry and a championship at the end.... 4 in total haha
